description: Making sushi is easy! This vegetarian avocado and tofu sushi recipe will be a lunch box hit. They're nutritionally approved and super simple to prepare.
keywords: Sushi,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Raspberry,Back to school,Halal,Vegetarian,Rice,Tofu
name: Sushi Lunch Box Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium Lebanese cucumber, cut into matchsticks
1 large red capsicum, deseeded, cut into matchsticks
100g Macro honey soy tofu, cut into matchsticks
80g light tasty cheese, cut into batons

recipeInstructions.text: Working with one nori sheet at a time, lay it flat on sushi mat. Spread half the rice over nori sheet, leaving a 2cm border on top edge. Arrange a piece of avocado, and a few pieces each of the cucumber and capsicum on bottom edge of rice. Top with tofu then roll up tightly from the bottom edge, wetting exposed top edge with a little water just before rolling to enclose. Apply gentle pressure to seal. Repeat with remaining nori sheet and filling. Chill in fridge.
Cut each sushi roll into 4 pieces and place in lunch boxes along with extra cucumber and capsicum, eggs, cheese and raspberries.
